TopicTitle: A Main Weather Satellite has Failed

Articles.Content:
It looks like the 0.20 update managed to break things orbiting in the real world as well.

GOES-13 has apparently lost it's imaging equipment. This covers the North American east coast and the tropical Atlantic; the places you might want to keep an eye on as we enter hurricane season.

They are bringing GOES-14 on-line and getting it into position but if it goes bad then there isn't another backup.
